text:
🌡️ **Heating Network Repairs**

In some dormitories on Braichevskogo and Yangel streets, there is no hot water supply.

Estimated return time, according to Kyivteploenergo: tomorrow at 15:00.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Some dormitories on Braichevskogo and Yangel streets are currently without hot water. According to Kyivteploenergo, service is expected to resume by 15:00 tomorrow.
title: Heating Repairs on Braichevskogo

text:
**🌡️ Repair Work on Heating Networks**

Today from 9:00, there is no hot water supply and heating in most dormitories.

Estimated return time: 12:00 on November 12.

title: Dormitory Heating Outage Today

text: Dear residents, due to pipe repairs in the basement, there will be no water temporarily on the right side.
rephrased_news: Residents are advised that there will be a temporary water outage on the right side due to pipe repairs in the basement.
title: Temporary Water Outage Alert

text:
**🌡️ Heating Network Emergency**

In the dormitories on Mykhailo Braichevskyi Street and Koval'skyi Lane, there is no hot water supply due to a heating network break.

Estimated return time, according to Kyivteploenergo: today by 20:00.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Dormitories on Mykhailo Braichevskyi Street and Koval'skyi Lane are without hot water due to a heating network break. Kyivteploenergo estimates restoration by 20:00 today.
title: Emergency Heating Network Break

text:
💧**May Without Water**

In the dormitories, there is no hot water supply due to a heating network break and ongoing repair work until May 13 at 23:59. After their completion, hydraulic tests of the pipes will begin until the end of the month.

Estimated completion date for all work and return of water, according to Kyivteploenergo: May 28 — 31.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Dormitories are without hot water due to a heating network break and ongoing repairs, which are expected to last until May 13 at 23:59. Hydraulic tests will follow, with a projected completion date for all work between May 28 and 31.
title: Extended Hot Water Outage

text:
💡**Power Outages**

Starting from May 16, hourly power outages may occur in Kyiv and the student campus according to the [schedule](https://www.dtek-kem.com.ua/ua/shutdowns) of Ukrenergo and DTEK.

Preliminary outages may occur [from](https://t.me/suspilnenews/32727) 00:00 to 9:00 or from 16:00 to 24:00.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Starting May 16, hourly power outages may occur in Kyiv and the student campus according to the schedules provided by Ukrenergo and DTEK.
title: Kyiv Power Outages Scheduled

text:
**🟢 Administration**

**Shelters**
Repairs are planned in 6 dormitories that have shelters by autumn.

**Power Banks**
For emergency charging, most dormitories have [power banks](https://t.me/ecokpi/142) available at the reception.

If you do not have a power bank or it is in poor condition, write for a replacement to @kpicampus_bot.

**Generators**
Will only be used in case of power outages lasting more than 4 hours, and only for charging flashlights and phones.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Repairs are planned in six dormitories with shelters by autumn. Power banks are available at most dormitory receptions for emergency charging. Generators will be used only during power outages lasting over four hours.
title: Dormitory Emergency Preparedness

text:
UPD: The hot water supply outage has been extended to June 10.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The hot water supply outage has been extended until June 10.
title: Hot Water Outage Extended

text:
🟢  **Administration**

**Accommodation**
The accommodation algorithm for summer will be announced tomorrow, based on a similar, [last year's principle](https://t.me/kpicampus/1580).

The number of accommodation places for the next academic year is planned to increase by 1.5 thousand. Instructions for accommodation will be available by July 17.

**Elevators**
Elevators are starting to resume operation, but you need to monitor the outage schedules to avoid getting stuck in the elevator in the middle of the night.

**Inventory**
From June 5 to 7, an inventory commission will check the current state of inventory in the rooms.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The accommodation process for summer will be announced tomorrow, following last year's principles. An increase of 1,500 accommodation places is planned for the next academic year, with instructions available by July 17.
title: Summer Accommodation Updates

text:
🏡  **Summer Accommodation**

**The accommodation algorithm this year for students remains unchanged. You need to settle all debts, fill out a clearance form, and write a request for summer accommodation.

The payment for the summer period this time will be 1600/1800, regardless of the number of residents in the room.

New entrants pay according to [third-party tariffs](https://t.me/kpicampus/1053) and retain their place if they previously lived in the dormitory. After submitting documents for the master's/PhD program at KPI, applicants can submit confirming documents to reduce the amount and pay 1600/1800 UAH accordingly.

To settle in, submit a request to the dormitory manager by June 21.

**Examples of requests**:
[• for students](https://docs.google.com/document/d/18Ih1pOeL3Jwd3HrYOX9VPMIYlFr9iuC8/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=107631616912058936796&rtpof=true&sd=true);
[• for master's entrants](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WiTAFG_VdgJwCL1MBtTQOJF-MsTYfr9a/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=107631616912058936796&rtpof=true&sd=true);
[• for academic leave](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rQ7il7UyCBvmys_7btfBAHesnCu56ahi/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=107631616912058936796&rtpof=true&sd=true).

If you have questions, write to @kpicampus_bot.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The accommodation process for students remains unchanged this year. Students must settle debts, complete a clearance form, and submit a request for summer accommodation by June 21.
title: Summer Accommodation Guidelines

text:
🟢 **Administration 06.08**

**Accommodation**
Will start on August 26, and by the end of the week, there will be lists for accommodation from faculties and institutes. A total of about 9 thousand students are planned to be brought out for mixed learning.

**Masters**
By August 2, they should have written a [request](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13FJxmoUKzXYeRo9T8oGxshdi3MXm1faIDpQwAO6Tk1E/edit?usp=sharing) for a change in payment format and extension of residence in the dormitory until August 31.

If you have not written a request, please contact the manager.

**Hot Water**
In some dormitories, there has been no hot water for 3 months due to major repair work.

**Elevators**
Due to the stabilization of electricity supply, the operation of most elevators will be restored.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Accommodation will begin on August 26, with lists from faculties and institutes available by the end of the week. Approximately 9,000 students are expected to participate in mixed learning.
title: Accommodation Plans for August

text:
**🔑 Accommodation for Senior Students**

Students of 2nd–4th year of bachelor's and 2nd year of master's programs who fall under priority categories can settle from **August 26** to **September 15** for the new academic year. If you are settling in for the first time — make sure to do it **by September 5**.

First-year master's students will settle **from September 10 to 15**.

**Priority Categories:**
1. People from ONT/TOT, children of parents with combatant status, orphans, and children deprived of parental care.
2. Those who are on the [lists of in-person disciplines](https://t.me/sr_kpi/4925).

Follow the [accommodation algorithm](https://telegra.ph/Poselennya-studentstva-starshih-kurs%D1%96v-08-13#%D0%9D%D0%B5%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%85%D1%96%D0%B4%D0%BD%D1%96-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8).

If you have questions, write to @kpicampus_bot.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Students in priority categories can settle from August 26 to September 15 for the new academic year. First-year master's students will settle from September 10 to 15.
title: Senior Student Accommodation Info

text:
🙌 **Volunteer Recruitment for Accommodation Assistance**

We are looking for volunteers who are ready to help with the accommodation of newcomers! This is a great opportunity to meet new people and make the lives of first-year students in the campus easier.

If you have some free time and want to do something useful – fill out the [form at the link](https://forms.gle/3i48ThrZcRTxM3e68) **by August 25 inclusive.** We look forward to having you on our team!

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Volunteers are being recruited to assist with the accommodation of newcomers. Interested individuals can fill out a form by August 25.
title: Volunteer Help for New Students
